meanings.definition: Refuse to admit the truth or existence of something.
meanings.sent1: She denies seeing the missing cookie.
meanings.sent2: He denies any involvement in the prank.
meanings.sent3: The cat denies knocking over the vase with a mischievous grin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile denies any sadness lurking beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds deny the possibility of a sunny day ahead.

meanings.definition: Refuse to give or grant something requested or desired.
meanings.sent1: The store denies refunds without a receipt.
meanings.sent2: He denies her request for a raise.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn lock denies entry to the room.
meanings.sent4: His busy schedule denies him the luxury of free time.
meanings.sent5: The closed sign denies any hope of a late-night snack run.
